name: Patient Enrollment Automation
description: Automatically schedules screening visits, sends consent forms, and creates patient records when potential participants respond to recruitment outreach

name: SAE Alert & Reporting
description: Monitors incoming emails for serious adverse event keywords, flags urgent cases, and initiates regulatory reporting workflow with pre-filled templates

name: Invoice Processing & Payment
description: Extracts line items from site invoices, validates against budget, routes for approval, and initiates payment processing

name: IRB Submission Tracker
description: Monitors IRB submission deadlines, compiles required documents, and sends automated reminders for continuing reviews and amendments

name: Site Monitoring Visit Scheduler
description: Coordinates CRA availability with site calendars, sends visit confirmation packets, and generates pre-visit checklists automatically

name: Protocol Deviation Workflow
description: Logs protocol deviations, assesses severity, assigns corrective actions, and tracks resolution with automated follow-up reminders

name: Patient Stipend Processing
description: Calculates patient compensation based on completed visits, generates payment requests, and tracks disbursement status

name: CRF Query Resolution
description: Routes data queries to appropriate site staff, tracks response times, and escalates overdue queries with automated reminders

name: Laboratory Results Distribution
description: Receives lab results from central lab, flags abnormal values, notifies PIs, and updates EDC with required documentation

name: Sponsor Report Generation
description: Compiles enrollment metrics, safety data, and milestone achievements into monthly sponsor reports with automated distribution
